biography: Tommy, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a unique blend of determination and joviality to the greens. Representing Espoo Ringside Golf, Tommy's presence is always felt, both for his sporting conduct and easy-going nature.

Though Tommy is yet to secure a victory at the Hector Trophée, his competitive spirit remains undeterred. With a meticulous approach to the game, Tommy meticulously studies every lie and estimates wind conditions with care. He has participated in the Hector Trophée twice so far and will make his third appearance in the upcoming edition.

Off the course, Tommy is known for his camaraderie, often sharing a laugh with fellow competitors and officials alike. Tommy embodies the spirit of the game, cherishing the bonds formed through friendly competition. While the Victor Trophy and Hector Trophée have eluded him thus far, Tommy's dedication suggests that success may well be on the horizon.
